amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds for highway beautification.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to enforce section 319 of title 23, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 237 (Roll no. 282).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 237 (Roll no. 282).
